Setup

Here is what is needed to follow these series

Requirements

A computer running Windows 7 (or higher).

Compilers ...

Install any edition of Visual Studio 2015 or 2017. I'm not sure earlier versions of Visual Studio will work and I won't check.

Visual Studio can be downloaded and installed from the official website.

IDE

Although Visual Studio is an IDE, it's too heavy and does too much and, in the way hides some of the things that allow the real understanding of .Net. For that, a simpler IDE is recommended. For the to-the-point, balance between simplicity, code highlighting and intellisense, I choose Visual Studio Code.

Visual Studio Code can be downloaded and installed from the official website.
